description: Renting a flat in Sector 117 Noida provides flexibility and choice. We offer a variety of sizes and layouts designed to suit different needs and family sizes. Understanding the specific benefits of each configuration helps streamline your search and ensures you land the perfect property without unnecessary effort.

From compact units perfect for singles to large apartments accommodating joint families our portfolio of flats for rent in Sector 117 is extensive and up-to-date. Review the common rental types available and see how they can meet your living requirements in this strategic location.

whyChoose.title: Why Sector 117 is the Smartest Choice for Your Next Rental Flat in Noida
description: Choosing the right location is as important as choosing the right flat. Sector 117 Noida offers a unique blend of strategic positioning affordability and rapid urban development making it a prime destination for renters across different demographics.

This sector provides high-quality living spaces at competitive rental prices compared to older established areas of Noida ensuring you get better value for your monthly rent. Here are the compelling reasons why renting in Sector 117 is a decision you will appreciate.

points.title: Exceptional Metro Connectivity
points.description: Sector 117 enjoys superb access to the Noida Metro Aqua Line particularly via the Sector 101 station and nearby stations. This connectivity ensures swift and stress-free commuting to Greater Noida Delhi and other commercial hubs a crucial factor for tenants searching for a quality Flat For Rent in Sector 117.

points.title: Affordable Rental Value
points.description: Compared to sectors closer to the Delhi border Sector 117 offers significantly more competitive rental rates for modern well-maintained flats. This affordability allows tenants to secure spacious housing and better amenities without stretching their budget making it ideal for young families and professionals.

points.title: Proximity to IT and Business Centers
points.description: The sector is strategically located near major employment hubs including Sector 62 and Sector 132. Tenants working in the IT and corporate sector benefit from shorter commute times enhancing work-life balance a significant draw for the rental market here.

points.title: Developed Social Infrastructure
points.description: Sector 117 is surrounded by leading schools hospitals supermarkets and entertainment complexes. Residents have all essential services within easy reach improving the convenience and overall livability of renting a flat in this area of Noida.

points.title: Modern and New Residential Projects
points.description: Most rental properties in Sector 117 are situated in relatively new housing societies. These complexes boast modern architecture superior construction quality and up-to-date amenities which older sectors often lack ensuring a high standard of living.

points.title: Safety and Secure Gated Societies
points.description: Security is a top priority for renters. Flats for rent in Sector 117 Noida are predominantly located within gated communities that offer 24/7 manned security CCTV surveillance and controlled access ensuring a safe environment for all residents especially families.

points.title: Availability of Diverse Flat Types
points.description: The inventory here ranges from compact studio apartments to luxurious 3 BHK and 4 BHK units providing numerous options to match specific financial and spatial requirements. This variety ensures that every tenant can find their perfect Flat For Rent in Sector 117.

points.title: Vibrant Community Environment
points.description: Living in Sector 117 means joining a young and dynamic community. The societies frequently organize community events and boast common areas like parks and clubhouses fostering social interaction and a warm neighborhood feel.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Renting a Flat in Sector 117 Noida
faqSection.description: We address the most common concerns potential tenants have regarding rental flats lease agreements and living standards in Sector 117 to help you make an informed decision.

faqs.question: What is the typical rent range for a 2 BHK flat in Sector 117 Noida
faqs.answer: The rental price for a standard 2 BHK flat in Sector 117 typically ranges between ₹15000 and ₹25000 per month. This variation depends heavily on factors such as the society's amenities whether the unit is furnished or semi-furnished the floor level and the age of the building. Newer projects with premium facilities like pool access and dedicated power backup tend to command rents at the higher end of this scale. Always verify what maintenance charges are included or excluded in the quoted rent.

faqs.question: Are Sector 117 rental properties usually furnished or unfurnished
faqs.answer: Sector 117 offers a good mix of semi-furnished and fully furnished flats although unfurnished options remain common particularly in larger societies. Semi-furnished flats usually include basic fixtures like fans lights modular kitchens and wardrobes. Fully furnished options are excellent for immediate occupancy offering beds sofas appliances and sometimes even kitchen utensils perfect for tenants relocating from different cities or countries.

faqs.question: What is the standard security deposit required for flats in this sector
faqs.answer: The standard security deposit in Sector 117 Noida generally aligns with the city average which is two months' worth of rent. For a flat costing ₹20000 per month you would typically need to provide a security deposit of ₹40000 plus the first month's rent in advance. This deposit is refundable at the end of the lease term pending any damages to the property.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity from Sector 117 to major parts of Noida and Delhi
faqs.answer: Connectivity is a major highlight of Sector 117. It is strategically positioned near the FNG Expressway providing fast access to Faridabad Ghaziabad and Delhi. Furthermore the sector is close to the Noida Metro Aqua Line station at Sector 101 ensuring reliable public transport to key locations like Sector 142 and eventually linking up with the Blue Line for Central Delhi access. Road networks are well-maintained and extensive.

faqs.question: Are there good schools and healthcare facilities near Sector 117
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 117 boasts strong social infrastructure. Reputable schools like Prometheus School and Sapphire International School are nearby. For healthcare major hospitals such as Yatharth Super Speciality Hospital and Fortis Hospital Noida are easily accessible within a 15 to 20 minute drive ensuring residents have access to quality education and medical care close to their rental flat.

faqs.question: What are the common lease terms for a Flat For Rent in Sector 117
faqs.answer: The most common lease term for residential property in Sector 117 is 11 months which is frequently renewable upon mutual agreement. Some landlords are open to 12-month agreements or longer leases especially for corporate tenants. It is essential to thoroughly review the exit clause rent escalation terms and notice period detailed within the rental agreement before signing.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay a brokerage fee to rent a flat in Sector 117
faqs.answer: If you use a real estate agent or professional property manager to find your Flat For Rent in Sector 117 you will likely incur a brokerage fee. This fee is typically equivalent to one month's rent payable upon signing the lease agreement. Using a verified agency ensures access to vetted properties and professional lease handling services.

faqs.question: Is parking easily available for tenants in Sector 117 housing societies
faqs.answer: Most modern housing societies in Sector 117 provide dedicated parking spaces either basement covered or open allocated to each flat usually for one car and one two-wheeler. If you require extra parking slots it is crucial to clarify availability and any associated additional charges with the landlord or society management before finalizing the lease agreement.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect in rented flats in this area
faqs.answer: Flats in Sector 117 often come with access to excellent society amenities. These typically include 24/7 security and power backup provision access to a clubhouse gymnasium swimming pool landscaped gardens and children's play areas. Specific premium amenities vary by complex so check the listing details carefully before viewing the property.

faqs.question: What maintenance charges apply to rental flats in Sector 117 Noida
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges cover the upkeep of common areas security and shared amenities. In Sector 117 these charges are generally paid by the tenant or sometimes shared between the tenant and landlord. They typically range from ₹2500 to ₹5000 per month depending on the flat size and the luxury level of the society. Always confirm who is responsible for paying these charges in the final agreement.
